price: 6. Maka pasti akan Kami tanyakan kepada umat yang telah mendapat seruan (dari rasul-rasul) dan Kami akan tanyai (pula) para rasul,
arabic: فَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falanasalanna alladhīna ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna al-mur'salīna
